Keywords: Frightful Four , Masters of Evil , Sinister Syndicate
Real Name: Morris Bench
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Hindering
FRIGHTFUL FOUR: OPPOSING TIDE: UNIQUE MODIFIER - Opposing character modify damage -1 when making a range attack that targets 1+ friendly characters with the Frightful Four keyword.
DROWN ON DRY LAND: Poison, Smoke Cloud. When Hydro-Man uses Smoke Cloud, he generates water markers instead and after resolutions he can use Poison at no cost and considers opposing characters occupying his water markers adjacent for Poison.

Goop
Exact same stats/powers as Sandman so i imagine you use Wizard to switch out which one is going to be more useful against a particular opponent. Hydroman is the preferred choice against teams with minimal dmg reducers where smoke cloud/poison can do lots of free damage. The damage -1 trait is also a big deal since having imperv means they need a 4 dmg to hurt you.
